DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effectiveness two pain medication reduce discomfort Ultherapy treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Study : Compare Effectiveness Between Two Pain Medications When Used Prior Ultherapyâ„¢ Treatments
DOC.detailed_description: This trial prospective , single-site , double-blinded , randomized trial . All study subject receive full face neck Ultherapy treatment . Subjects randomize receive one two pain medication prior treatment . Each subject ask rate level discomfort Ultherapy treatment . All study subject follow 90 day follow treatment .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year Subject good health Skin laxity upper low face neck Understands accepts obligation undergo procedure area treat followup period Known sensitivity ibuprofen , acetaminophen , opiates Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound heal Severe solar elastosis Excessive subcutaneous fat face neck Excessive skin laxity face neck Significant scar area treat Significant open facial wound lesion Severe cystic acne face Presence metal stent implant facial area treat
